# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business operations. Given its high value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9500. This special offer is tailored to acknowledge your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. I am confident that this investment will yield significant returns for you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
